description: The initiative, Trulab, is a consultancy and accelerator based in Cali, Colombia, focused on enhancing sustainable business models within the food sector. Established eight years ago, Trulab aims to support small and emerging food-related enterprises by providing technical assistance, fostering business linkages, and facilitating impact financing. The organization emphasizes a fair distribution of benefits across the food production chain and has successfully increased the income of its clients by 20%. Trulab operates with a team of 35 to 50 contracted professionals who engage directly with beneficiaries in various regions, offering personalized support and guidance. The initiative is committed to generating measurable social impact and aims to mobilize significant investment in the coming years, while maintaining a flexible and horizontal organizational structure to adapt to the challenges of the entrepreneurial landscape in Colombia.
name: Trulab
